title: Amy Schumer | Getting To Know Pete Buttigieg | Steve King's Problematic Meme: Couple Things
description:
Seth has a couple things to say to Iowa Representative Steve King and his problematic meme.

Then, Seth reads off a list of facts about 2020 Democratic presidential candidate Mayor Pete Buttigieg.

Finally, Amy Schumer talks about the difficulties she's endured during her pregnancy, the very graphic cake her sister-in-law gave her and performing while pregnant in her new stand-up special.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
